name: The Ark (SoloBro)
description:
The Ark

The humans have invaded our planet and we must evacuate. Save as many animals as you can and get them back to the rocket before it launches!

I made this game for the Indie Game Dev Beginners #003 game jam. The theme was Robots.

This is only a prototype that I may update in the future, so try not to fall off of the world :)

Highscore and animals collected will not be saved in the browser version, and there may be some lag. Play the downloadable version for a better experience.
